title: Geometric Grunge Pattern
content: This interesting graphic design features a patchwork pattern of geometric shapes, half tones and grunge textures. I used Adobe Photoshop and Filter Forge software to develop this image, and have applied it to many different products… Available in these galleries ▸ Society 6, Redbubble, Fine Art America, Cafepress
